longInfo:
Passport required.
- Passports issued by Chinese Taipei (on the cover: Republic
  of China Taiwan) must be valid for the period of intended
  stay. 
Passport Exemptions:
- For additional exemptions and requirements see passport
  exemptions mentioned for the USA. 

Visa required, except for A max. stay of 45 days for those
entitled to travel under the Guam-Northern Mariana Isl. Visa
Waiver program, for holiday or business purposes (SEE NOTE
30572). 
    NOTE 30572: Provided passenger: 
 - applicable to holders of Chinese Taipei (on the cover:
   Republic of China Taiwan) passports, accompanied by a
   National ID Card issued by Chinese Taipei (Taiwan Identity
   Card). They must begin their journey in Chinese Taipei and
   travel on a direct non-stop flight to Guam; 
Visa required, except for A max. stay of 90 days for holders
of Chinese Taipei (on the cover: Republic of China Taiwan)
biometric passports traveling as a tourist, on business or in
transit, provided passport includes a Personal ID number (SEE
NOTE 49199) (SEE NOTE 60199). 
    NOTE 49199: Passengers must obtain an ESTA authorization
   (via https://esta.cbp.dhs.gov/) prior to boarding. 
    NOTE 60199: Passengers must hold a return/onward ticket.
Minors:
- Minors travelling accompanied by one parent or by a person
  other than parent/legal guardian . 
Additional Information:
- Visitors are required to hold proof of sufficient funds to
  cover their stay and documents required for their next
  destination. (SEE NOTE 46947)
    NOTE 46947: Exempt are holders of a valid US visa
